original_text: ‘Listen!’ he said to them. ‘We are going to Jerusalem. There, someone will deliver the Son of Man to the leaders of the priests and the teachers of God's Law. These Jewish leaders will decide that I must die.
korean_text: 보라 우리가 예루살렘으로 올라가노니 인자가 대제사장들과 서기관들에게 넘겨지매 그들이 죽이기로 결의하고

sentences.original_text: There, someone will deliver the Son of Man
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 어떤 사람이 인자를 넘겨줄 것이다.

sentences.original_text: to the leaders of the priests
and the teachers of God's Law.
